title: Pool party Fiddlesticks
body:
Think about it  
 {{champion:9}}

I know he's getting a full rework so i thought It would be a good time to through out some cool ideas. I would love to see this as an old fiddlesticks main this has been one of my greatest ideas.

Ok I can see some of you can’t imagine what he’ll look like. Well I imagined hime to be made of pool noodles and beach umbrellas. He would have seagulls instead of crows. It will of course change because of the visual update but I came off with this about one and  a half years ago ,so cut me some slack.

replies.body: yea wait for the rework but still, that would be sick.
Well of course but it’s a good time, a lot of reworked champs get new skins at release or a few months latter so if we get the idea around maybe we’ll have a chance of getting it

Um......ok?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

Care to explain how that would work? How would he look? What would the abilities be like?

Though since he's getting a full VGU, creating a pool party skin concept based on his current design & kit would be a waste of time. Regardless, you got to do more than "Pool Party Fiddlesticks" if you want to sell me on this fantasy.
So his crow is a seagull, his drain is a huge water water beam, his fear is a boo with water affect and his ult is a swimming pool with seagulls flying around

What would the crow be? Water bomb? 
What would his ult be?
He does not fit the theme. How about they remake suprise party fiddlesticks and make it better?
Just stick a potato sack in a bikini and spray paint him an obnoxious colour, i love it!
Just stick a potato sack in a bikini and spray paint him an obnoxious colour, i love it!
Fiddles is getting a full rework, no chance of him getting a skin any time soon.
